titleStmt.title: The grounds and foundation of natural religion, discover'd, in the principal branches of it in opposition to the prevailing notions of the modern scepticks and latitudinarians. With an introduction concerning the necessity of revealed religion. By Tho. Beconsall, B.D. and fellow of Brasenose Colledge, in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Becconsall, Thomas, d. 1709.

Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
